title: Overtone - Realistic AI Offline Text to Speech (TTS)
description: Overtone is an offline Text-to-Speech asset for UE. Enrich your game with 15+ languages, 900+ English voices, rapid performance, and cross-platform support.
longDescription:
Introducing Overtone, a cutting-edge offline Text-to-Speech (TTS) asset. With Overtone, you can effortlessly add realistic AI-generated voices to your games, bringing your characters to life and enhancing the overall gaming experience. No ongoing subscription or payment needed


Trailer


Audio Samples


Documentation | Support | Discord



Key Features:


  • 🌍 20+ Languages: Overtone supports voices in 20+ different languages, opening your game to a global audience.


  • 🔊 900+ English Voices: Choose from a vast selection of over 900 unique English voices, giving your characters unparalleled diversity and authenticity.


  • 📴 Fully Offline: Overtone operates entirely offline on Android, Oculus, Windows, Linux, macOS, and iOS platforms, providing seamless TTS functionality without the need for an internet connection. Overtone does not use any native TTS system, allowing it to run in resource constrained platforms like Oculus. No ongoing subscription or payment needed


  • ⚡ Fast Performance: Developed in C++, Overtone delivers top-tier performance, ensuring smooth, high-quality audio playback even in the most demanding gaming scenarios.


Upgrade your gaming experience with Overtone's advanced, offline Text-to-Speech capabilities. Incorporate Overtone into your project today and take your game to the next level.



For any questions or concerns, our dedicated support team is always ready to help at help@leastsquares.io or on Discord.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 🌍 20+ Languages: Overtone supports voices in 20+ different languages, opening your game to a global audience.
  • 🔊 900+ English Voices: Choose from a vast selection of over 900 unique English voices.
  • 📴 Fully Offline: Overtone operates entirely offline on Android, Oculus, Windows, Linux, macOS, and iOS platforms, providing seamless TTS functionality without the need for an internet connection. Overtone does not use any native TTS system, allowing it to run in resource constrained platforms.
  • ⚡ Fast Performance: Developed in C++, Overtone delivers top-tier performance, ensuring smooth, high-quality audio playback.
  • 🎮 Cross-Platform: Overtone is compatible with all major platforms.


Code Modules:

  •  Overtone (Runtime)
  •  OvertoneEditor (Editor)
  •  OvertoneManagement (Editor)


Number of Blueprints: 2

Number of C++ Classes: 18

Network Replicated: No

Supported Development Platforms: macOS, Linux, Windows

Supported Target Build Platforms: macOS, Linux, Windows, iOS, Android
